verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4319"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H8034"\w*

said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* mother, “\w The|strong="H3947"\w* eleven \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 17:2 \ft 1,100 shekels is approximately 27.6 pounds or 12.5 kilograms of silver; also in verse 3.\f* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w about|strong="H3947"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* heard \w you|strong="H3947"\w* utter \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w curse|strong="H1288"\w*—\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* mother said, “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!”

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* eleven \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* mother, \w she|strong="H3967"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w wholly|strong="H6942"\w* \w dedicate|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w benefit|strong="H3027"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* mother, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w she|strong="H3967"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H3947"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 17:4 \ft 200 shekels is approximately 5 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of silver.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w silversmith|strong="H6884"\w*, \w who|strong="H6884"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4319"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shrine|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ephod \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w some|strong="H3027"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w idols|strong="H8655"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w ordained|strong="H4390"\w* \f + \fr 17:5 \ft Hebrew filled the hand of; also in verse 12\f* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; everyone \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w from|strong="H3881"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H1035"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* residing \w within|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w This|strong="H6213"\w* man \w left|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* settle \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* could \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* traveled, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ephraim.

“Where \w are|strong="H3063"\w* \w you|strong="H4672"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w*?” \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* asked \w him|strong="H4672"\w*. “\w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1980"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* settle \w wherever|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w can|strong="H1980"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place.”

“\w Stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*,” \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* father \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 17:10 \ft 10 shekels is approximately 4 ounces or 114 grams of silver.\f* per \w year|strong="H3117"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w suit|strong="H6187"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* clothes, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* provisions.” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w*

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w agreed|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Micah.

\w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \w ordained|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w lived|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* said, “\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.”
